verses.verse: To the chief Musician<WH5329> upon<WH5921> Shushan-eduth,<WH7802> Michtam<WH4387> of David,<WH1732> to teach;<WH3925> when he strove with<WH5327> <WH853> Aram-naharaim<WH763> and with Aram-zobah,<WH760> when Joab<WH3097> returned,<WH7725> and smote<WH5221> of<WH853> Edom<WH123> in the valley<WH1516> of salt<WH4417> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> thousand.<WH505> O God,<WH430> thou hast cast us off,<WH2186> thou hast scattered<WH6555> us, thou hast been displeased;<WH599> O turn<WH7725> thyself to us again.
Thou hast made the earth<WH776> to tremble;<WH7493> thou hast broken<WH6480> it: heal<WH7495> the breaches<WH7667> thereof; for<WH3588> it shaketh.<WH4131>
Thou hast showed<WH7200> thy people<WH5971> hard<WH7186> things: thou hast made us to drink<WH8248> the wine<WH3196> of astonishment.<WH8653>
Thou hast given<WH5414> a banner<WH5251> to them that fear<WH3373> thee, that it may be displayed<WH5127> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the truth.<WH7189> Selah.<WH5542>
That <WH4616> thy beloved<WH3039> may be delivered;<WH2502> save<WH3467> with thy right hand,<WH3225> and hear<WH6030> me.
God <WH430> hath spoken<WH1696> in his holiness;<WH6944> I will rejoice,<WH5937> I will divide<WH2505> Shechem,<WH7927> and mete out<WH4058> the valley<WH6010> of Succoth.<WH5523>
Gilead <WH1568> is mine, and Manasseh<WH4519> is mine; Ephraim<WH669> also is the strength<WH4581> of mine head;<WH7218> Judah<WH3063> is my lawgiver;<WH2710>
Moab <WH4124> is my washpot;<WH5518> <WH7366> over<WH5921> Edom<WH123> will I cast out<WH7993> my shoe:<WH5275> Philistia,<WH6429> triumph<WH7321> thou because<WH5921> of me.
Who <WH4310> will bring<WH2986> me into the strong<WH4692> city?<WH5892> who<WH4310> will lead<WH5148> me into<WH5704> Edom?<WH123>
Wilt not<WH3808> thou,<WH859> O God,<WH430> which hadst cast us off?<WH2186> and thou, O God,<WH430> which didst not<WH3808> go out<WH3318> with our armies?<WH6635>
Give <WH3051> us help<WH5833> from trouble:<WH4480> <WH6862> for vain<WH7723> is the help<WH8668> of man.<WH120>
Through God<WH430> we shall do<WH6213> valiantly:<WH2428> for he<WH1931> it is that shall tread down<WH947> our enemies.<WH6862>
